00119     virtual int32_t reopen_fd() {
00120       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00121       if (m_fd != -1)
00122         m_filesys->close(m_fd);
00123       m_fd = m_filesys->open(m_filename);
00124       return m_fd;
00125     }
